messages.title: A strong local voice
messages.content: Cutting income tax and freezing fuel duty. Getting immigration down. Delivering a referendum on our membership of the EU.

messages.title: Securing real change in Europe
messages.content: Real change in Europe: only with the Conservatives. More jobs, lower taxes. Stop benefits tourism. Renegotiate our membership of the EU.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting income tax and freezing fuel duty.
Delivering a referendum on our membership of the EU. Renegotiate our membership of the EU.
1.7 billion more for the NHS supported by Richard Bacon.

mentions.candidate: Richard Bacon, a key member of the Public Accounts Committee, he has saved you, the taxpayer, billions of pounds. Richard Bacon is working for South Norfolk

issues.brexitEurope: More jobs, lower taxes. Stop benefits tourism. Renegotiate our membership of the EU. Delivering a referendum on our membership of the EU.
issues.economy: Cutting income tax and freezing fuel duty.
issues.health: 1.7 billion more for the NHS supported by Richard Bacon.

leaflet.personalStatement: Richard Bacon is a strong voice for South Norfolk in Parliament. He has been congratulated by Labour and LibDem MPs for his achievements. Having saved you, the taxpayer, billions of pounds, he is working for South Norfolk.

politicalExperience.achievements: Richard Bacon, a key member of the Public Accounts Committee, has saved you, the taxpayer, billions of pounds.

endorsements.endorsement: Richard Bacon is a great example of how a backbench Member of Parliament can make a difference...

quotes.text: Richard Bacon is a great example of how a backbench Member of Parliament can make a difference... he's been congratulated by Labour and LibDem MPs for his achievement.

images.caption: Richard Bacon campaigning and engaging with constituents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Some sections of the leaflet are not fully legible due to the angle and clarity of the image provided. Therefore, some fields could not be completed without additional information.
